```{python}
import re

with open("conlang.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
  text = f.read()
words_all = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", text.lower())
words_all = [w for w in words_all if w]
print(words_all[:15])
```

```{python}
vowels = set("aeiouɜ")
words_v = [wd for wd in words_all if any(ch in vowels for ch in wd)]
words_no_v = [wd for wd in words_all if not any(ch in vowels for ch in wd)]
```

```{python}
print("First 30 words (with vowels):")
print(words_v[:30])
print()
print("Counts:")
print("  total tokens after edge-punct clean:", len(words_all))
print("  kept (has ≥1 vowel):", len(words_v))
print("  removed (no vowels):", len(words_no_v))
```
